job_tasks.phrase: het verbeteren van hun AI-modellen door menselijke feedback te leveren
job_tasks.justification: Providing human feedback is a crucial part of preparing and managing data for AI model training and evaluation, aligning with the definition of data engineering for AI.

job_tasks.phrase: interactie vereisen met deze modellen terwijl ze leren coderen
job_tasks.justification: This interaction, in the context of training, implies providing input or evaluation for the learning process, which falls under data preparation for training.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: Creating and answering questions is a direct method of generating training data for AI models, fitting the definition of data preparation.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking model output is a form of data annotation and quality control for training data, which is part of data management for AI.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on tasks related to providing human feedback, creating questions and answers, and evaluating model-generated code to help train generative AI models. These tasks fall predominantly under Macro-Category B, specifically '1.B.3. Data Engineering & Management', and are focused on Generative AI. There are no tasks mentioned from Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). Therefore, the 'GenAI Specialist' profile is the most appropriate.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly defines the core AI-related tasks as providing feedback and data for training generative AI models, which maps directly to '1.B.3. Data Engineering & Management'. The absence of any tasks from Macro-Category A makes the profile assignment unambiguous. However, the ad is light on specific technologies and soft skills, and the title 'Big Data Engineer' might be a broad descriptor for the specific evaluation/annotation tasks mentioned.
